Contacts

How to Contact Us

You may contact the Ethiopian Orphans Support UK Charity Fund by post, e-mail or telephone. Our contact details are as follows:

  • Mailing address

    EOS-UK Charity Fund
    c/o 5 The Cedars
    Stockwell Road
    Tettenhall
    WOLVERHAMPTON
    WV6 9AZ
    UK

  • E-Mail:

    eosukcharityfund@gmail.com

  • Telephone

    Tel. No.: +44(0)1902 751083
    Mobile: +44(0)7867 727445

Wolverhampton
